question: how to use the pan toilets here, how do i clean after pissing if there are only tissue papers available here
answer:
QUESTION

i m in the us at the moment, i can seem to find how to use the pan toilets here. especially when u dont have water available here and there are only tissue papers available here.

1. how do i clean after pissing if there are only tissue papers available here. how did i purify my self.

2. how do i clean my self after shitting, when there are only tissue papers available. how do i purify my self so that i m able to pray.

ANSWER


Share:

We suggest you squat on top of the western toilet. However, you should be cautious that the impurities from the toilet do not splash on to your body and clothes.

With regards to cleaning yourself, you may take water with a bottle, etc. into the toilet to wash yourself. However, if this is difficult you may damp the tissue paper with water and use it to clean yourself.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
